title: Happy Birthday, Yoshiko-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Yoshiko-chan, happy birthday~~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Thanks. But it’s Yohane, not Yoshiko.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oh, sorry, my bad. Yohane-chan, happy birthday~~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Very well! Hey, is that a special outfit? You look great.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oh, this? This is the costume that Ayumu-chan, me, and the others will be wearing today~ We little demons wanted to do something special to celebrate Yoshiko-cha...... Yohane-chan’s birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ayumu and the others......? Heh, heh. That’s a great idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>She also said some weird stuff~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>......What did she say? Perhaps, an army of angels has come to attack us...... something like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Something like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kanata! We have to get to the party venue now! Before Ayumu and the others do something dangerous! Hurry!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
